vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the US Department of Agriculture (USDA), Forest Service Region, R8 (Grant No. 23-DG-11083150-602, Federal Assistance Listing No. 10.730), in the amount of $750,000.00 to perform urban tree inventory and condition assessment (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $750,000.00 in the USDA Forest Service Region R8 Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $750,000.00 in the USDA Forest Service Region R8 Fund and; (4) execution of the grant agreement with the USDA, Forest Service Region, R8 and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $750,000.00 - Financing: USDA, Forest Service Region, R8 Grant Funds
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from the US Department of Agriculture (USDA), Forest Service Region, R8 (Grant No. 23-DG-11083150-602, Federal Assistance Listing No. 10.730), in the amount of $750,000.00 to perform urban tree inventory and condition assessment (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $750,000.00 in the USDA Forest Service Region R8 Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $750,000.00 in the USDA Forest Service Region R8 Fund and; (4) execution of the grant agreement with the USDA, Forest Service Region, R8 and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $750,000.00 - Financing: USDA, Forest Service Region, R8 Grant Funds
